channel.title: 317 Delta: Changing Teleports

item.title: 317 Delta: Changing Teleports
item.dc:creator: @mrdrzj mrdrzj
item.description:
@mrdrzj wrote:

Im not sure about delta, but search for the Coords of the old teleport (let’s say your falador teleport took you to Varrock, you tele there and then do ::mypos or ::coords or check your coords in your saved game files, and then search for them in your source, and replace them.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Delta: Changing Teleports
item.dc:creator: @Intimidation Intimidation
item.description:
@Intimidation wrote:

Hey guys, I’m trying to change the Falador into a places teleport. I have changed the dialogue stuff all I need to know is how I can get it so when they click on the teleport it will take them to the place (at the moment I copy and pasted my PK teleports into there and that’s where they are teleportng).

case 73148: case 4146: c.teleEffect = 1; c.sendQuest("Which place?", 2470); c.sendQuest("Falador", 2471); c.sendQuest("Lumberbridge", 2472); c.sendQuest("Ardougne", 2473); c.sendFrame164(2469); break;

Read full topic
